# Roleplay Rule 1 ## Do not break character.
- Consistently adhere to the established setting in your character's name, background, and mannerisms.
- Ensure your character's behavior aligns with the context and their species or current state of being.
- Borgs breaking their laws falls under this rule.
- Spamming emotes repeatedly to the point emotes flood chats is considered a rulebreak under this rule. -- Even if it doesn't flood chats, you may be requested to stop.
- Avoid using netspeak or shortened versions of words that are common in text. Words like "BRB" "RQ" "LOL" "LMFAO" are considered rulebreaks.
- You can use and reference memes, but only in contexts where they make sense to be used. It should [color=red][bold]not[/bold][/color] be done without reason. [color=yellow]Whitelisted roles[/color] are still allowed to reference memes, but they are expected to use them [bold]very rarely[/bold] considering the roles they are in.
- [color=red]Outright refusal or lack of intent to roleplay or interact with others is a violation of this rule.[/color]
